content:
You're probably referring to Camila Elman, the Chicago-based lawyer who's gotten entangled in the Byrde family's mess. She's a great addition to the show, and her character adds a fresh dynamic to the story.

I'm glad you're enjoying Season 4 so far! Ozark is known for its intricate plotlines and complex characters, and it sounds like this season is living up to the show's reputation.

Remember, I'm here to help you keep track of your shows and provide a spoiler-free space to discuss your thoughts and feelings about the series. Feel free to share your reactions and theories about Ozark or any other show you're watching!
